content.html: Latest episode of Tech: Off-topic is out! This time @SecondeJ and I dragged @alistair_hey on and we had some hilarious chat about the linux foundation, modern frontends, and a bunch of other stuff go listen on anchor.fm/tech-off-topic… or on your favourite podcast platform
